text: Act only according to that maxim whereby you can at the same time will that it should become a universal law.
author: Immanuel Kant

text: The greatest happiness of the greatest number is the foundation of morals and legislation.
author: Jeremy Bentham

text: Let justice roll down like waters, and righteousness like an ever-flowing stream.
author: Amos 5:24 (Bible)

text: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: Do what is right, not what is easy.
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends toward justice.
author: Theodore Parker (popularized by MLK Jr.)

text: Faith does not make things easy, it makes them possible.
author: Luke 1:37 (Bible)
